comment.body:
Are you interested in making a tool to handle this automatically? If so, there's a library I can recommend: [Blockhash](http://blockhash.io/) finds unique hashes for images, and similar images (resizings/rotations/croppings) have similar hashes. I've messed with the javascript version, but haven't gotten it to work so far.
I have no idea if it's a good idea to make this automatic, but it might be possible.
